name: Apple
description: One apple everyday makes the doctor go away. Rebranded by Steve Jobs himself.

name: Orange
description: The orange is the fruit of the citrus species and it's orange from whatever point of view you look at it.

name: Banana
description: The banana is an edible fruit – botanically a berry – produced by several kinds of large herbaceous flowering plants in the genus Musa. Yes... Musa.

name: Papaya
description: Papaya plants grow in three sexes: male, female, hermaphrodite. Pick yours now!
